title: Can anyone help me. Please @Riot
body:
I got the skin elementalist lux when i first started playing this game and i made it my goal to get it i saved up to get lux then i grinded to get orange essence over 110 hours i have spent trying to get the skin and today i realized that i could get it if i got rid of blackfrost anivia and my ward shards so i did and was going to get lux but cause i disenchanted so many thing and my friends wanted me to hurry i accidentally disenchanted elementalist lux. I am so mad beyond comprehension. So much time wasted for nothing, can anyone help me out or can riot help some how. I have nothing now i got rid of it all to get the skin but in the end i made a stupid mistake. PLEASE SOMEONE HELP ME !!!!!!! 
Honestly i might stop playing league

replies.body: No worries bud! Reach out to us in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and there's a chance we could still rescue that shard. I can't make any promises, but since this was an accidental disenchant and didn't happen too long ago we might be able to get that shard back!
